item.title: How to make a header with R stickers for your LinkedIn and Twitter
item.description: It is fairly common for peoples to use LinkedIn and Twitter to look for opportunities and network with people in the field. But you would like to stay professional. To begin with creating a profile, it might take forever for you to pick their favorite picture as the header but still keep professional. Here is a good idea to create your own header with all your favorite R packages that is perfect for LinkedIn and Twitter.
